# HMCharacteristicValueCurrentVisibilityState.hidden

**Case**

The media source isn’t displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
case hidden
```

## Visibility states

- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentVisibilityState.alwaysShown**: The media source is always displayed.
- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentVisibilityState.connected**: The media source is displayed since there’s a device connected to the input source.
- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentVisibilityState.shown**: The media source is displayed.

items.description: The media source is always displayed.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValueCurrentVisibilityState.alwaysShown

items.description: The media source is displayed since there’s a device connected to the input source.
